title: Content Calendar Generator
description: Generate a content calendar with social media posts, blog topics, and email newsletters
example_prompt:
Help me create a content calendar for the next month. I need:

1. Social media posts (3 per week)
2. Blog post topics (1 per week)
3. Email newsletter ideas (2 per month)

Our target audience is developers and tech professionals. Focus on topics around AI, developer tools, and productivity. Include suggested posting times and content types (image, video, text).
example_result:
I've created a content calendar for next month. Here's the breakdown:

Week 1:
Social Media:
- Monday 9am: "ðŸ”¥ Just launched: Our new AI-powered code completion tool. Watch the demo! [Video]"
- Wednesday 2pm: "Top 5 VS Code extensions for productivity in 2025 [Image carousel]"
- Friday 4pm: "What's your go-to debugging technique? Share below! [Poll]"

Blog: "The Future of AI Pair Programming: Beyond Code Completion"

Week 2:
Social Media:
- Monday 10am: "Developer tip: Use these keyboard shortcuts to boost your workflow [Infographic]"
- Wednesday 3pm: "Behind the scenes: How we optimized our CI/CD pipeline [Thread]"
- Friday 1pm: "Weekend project: Build a ChatGPT plugin in 30 minutes [Tutorial link]"

Blog: "Optimizing Docker Builds: A Practical Guide"

Week 3:
Social Media:
- Monday 9am: "Meet our engineering team and their favorite dev tools [Team photo]"
- Wednesday 2pm: "Quick tip: Debug faster with these console.log alternatives [Code snippet]"
- Friday 3pm: "From monolith to microservices: Our journey [Case study]"

Blog: "Security Best Practices for AI Applications"

Week 4:
Social Media:
- Monday 11am: "New feature alert: AI-powered code review assistant [Demo video]"
- Wednesday 1pm: "The evolution of JavaScript: 2015 vs 2025 [Comparison image]"
- Friday 4pm: "What's your biggest coding pet peeve? [Interactive poll]"

Blog: "Building Scalable Systems with Kubernetes and AI"

Email Newsletters:
1. Mid-month (15th):
Subject: "Level Up Your Dev Game: AI Tools Special"
- Feature story: The impact of AI on code review
- Product updates
- Community spotlight
- Upcoming webinar announcement

2. Month-end (30th):
Subject: "Monthly Dev Digest: Top Stories & Updates"
- Blog roundup
- Most engaging social posts
- Industry news
- Developer resource of the month

All content has been added to your Google Calendar with reminders set 2 days before each posting date.
